title: Mobile-Based Interactive Mathematics Learning Program for Working Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: A flexible design considering work-life-learning balance for professionals, minimizing the technology gap through smartphone-centric accessibility

learning_goals: Learners participate ≥2 times monthly in real-time quizzes (5 questions) and discussions (3 sessions) on mobile platforms (Kahoot!, Slack, etc.), and submit video or text reports (3 minutes/500 characters) explaining step-by-step solutions for 3 probability/statistics problems.
Learners collaborate with peers using LMS-based collaboration tools to create project reports solving real-life application problems.
Learners submit self-directed learning records at least twice weekly via mobile learning modules and incorporate feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
